data.title: Panchasiddhantika, written by Varahamihira is based on?MathematicsScienceAstrologyAstronomy
data.meta_description: Click here:point_up_2:to get an answer to your question :writing_hand:panchasiddhantika written by varahamihira is based on
data.text:
Solution

Verified by Toppr

Panchasiddhantika was the major work by ancient astronomer Varahamihira. Panchasiddhantika means five astronomical canons. It basically summarises the five other books of astronomy viz. Surya, Romaka, Paulisa, Vasistha and Paitamaha Siddhanta. The book was written during 575 CE.
